name: RN apps: ANDROID ONLY - Share without default apps for photos / gallery

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Update notes: Linda 22 Aug 2022: Added RN_Smoke_Tests label during test case cleanup.

inline.description:
Share without default apps for photos / gallery
————————————————————————————
  1. Logged in to the app and then closed it
  2. Shared a file with share extension
  3. Removed default apps for the gallery and photos (google photos)
  4. Opened the app
  5. Attached files from images/videos
  6. and took a picture and shared
inline.expectedResult: • Share extension works, posts are made in the channel

customFields.Related ticket(s): Image attachments in the mobile app are not working — MM-21288
